description: This is a FastAPI router module for cart-related operations in an e-commerce backend. It defines API endpoints for retrieving, adding, updating, removing, and checking out cart items, utilizing dependencies for security and database access, and referencing external CRUD functions and schemas.

methods.name: get_cart(current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves the current user's cart with items.

methods.name: add_item( payload: CartItemCreate, current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Adds a product to the cart, enforcing stock availability.

methods.name: update_item( product_id: int, quantity: int = Body(..., embed=True, description="New quantity"), current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Updates the quantity of a cart item, removing it if the quantity is non-positive.

methods.name: remove_item( product_id: int, current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Removes a product from the cart.

methods.name: checkout( current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Creates an order from the current cart, enforcing stock, updating inventory, and closing the cart.

ctags.name: add_item
ctags.signature: ( payload: CartItemCreate, current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: remove_item
ctags.signature: ( product_id: int, current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: update_item
ctags.signature: ( product_id: int, quantity: int = Body(..., embed=True, description="New quantity"), current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
